heading: HB08933
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING A NATIONAL PROGRAM FOR THE CACAO INDUSTRY, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2019-02-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08933
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A NATIONAL PROGRAM FOR THE CACAO INDUSTRY, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to enhance education and training of all stakeholders in the cacao industry, collecting relevant research, scientific studies and market strategies, extending technologies and creating international linkages for development and promotion of the industry and its products. Provides for the composition of the National Cacao Development Council; the development of programs related to its objectives; and specifies its powers and functions.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : PICO, PEPITO M.
DATE FILED : 2019-01-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-02-04
